nodes.text: MB1711-V was the designation of the Imperial Survey Team that claimed to have found the Aldera Royal Palace in the remains of the Graveyard, along with information that Bail Prestor Organa was alive and located within the ruins.

Since the information was planted in Mining Outpost 11's computers as part of a trap to ensnare the Heroes of Yavin, it is unclear whether or not MB1711-V is a real survey team or merely invented for the deception.
